description: Add time related phrases required relative time handler
replace:
$0
"time.day": "{{ phrase('time.day')|escape('js') }}",
"time.days": "{{ phrase('time.days')|escape('js') }}",
"time.hour": "{{ phrase('time.hour')|escape('js') }}",
"time.hours": "{{ phrase('time.hours')|escape('js') }}",
"time.minute": "{{ phrase('time.minute')|escape('js') }}",
"time.minutes": "{{ phrase('time.minutes')|escape('js') }}",
"time.month": "{{ phrase('time.month')|escape('js') }}",
"time.months": "{{ phrase('time.months')|escape('js') }}",
"time.second": "{{ phrase('time.second')|escape('js') }}",
"time.seconds": "{{ phrase('time.seconds')|escape('js') }}",
"time.week": "{{ phrase('time.week')|escape('js') }}",
"time.weeks": "{{ phrase('time.weeks')|escape('js') }}",
"time.year": "{{ phrase('time.year')|escape('sj') }}",
"time.years": "{{ phrase('time.years')|escape('sj') }}",
